amendment.description: An amendment numbered 66 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for the implementation of the rule entitled "Equal Access in Accordance With an Individual's Gender Identity in Community Planning and Development Programs".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 217 (Roll no. 619).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 217 (Roll no. 619).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
